attributes.action: Give Morayshire it's own postcode, no more Highlands & Islands charges.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Morayshire should have it's own Postcode to seperate it from the Highlands & Islands postal charges. Elgin gets hit with these charges yet areas just 18 miles along the road can enjoy free delivery of goods by courier companies.
We are not in a remote area of Scotland as picked up by the current IV postecode system, with these delivery charges on the rise it needs to be addressed.

rejection.details: Please contact Royal Mail directly. http://www.royalmail.com
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
